reviewText: It is such a treat to see and hear this late, great artist.  Amazing that this voice comes out of such a man and you can tell he is truly singing of his heritage.  Great performance.

reviewText: I recently become acquainted with the music of Iz during a vacation on Maui, where we bought one of his CDs.  I decided to look into what other stuff was available and was delighted to see that he had made some DVDs, too.  I have only had it since 3 days and I've already watched it 3 times!  I can't get enough, it's pure magic to watch and listen to.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I did not discover Iz' music until I saw an episode of "ER" and Dr. Green was dying of cancer and Iz' "Somewhere Over the Rainbow" was playing.  I immediately went to amazon.com to find whatever I could of Iz.  To my dismay, I saw that Iz had died some years ago.  This DVD is excellent and shows Iz' spirit and fantastic talent.  He is a man who died much too young.
Title: N/A

reviewText: This video shows concert after concert starring Iz, the talented musician who lived in Hawaii. Due to his extreme weight issues, Iz rarely left his islands. Consequently, during his lifetime, few people outside of Hawaii knew of this great talent. Thanks to this DVD, more people will have the opportunity to meet this great musician!In each of his concerts, the viewer can feel the magic of Iz's performances and the beauty of his style as he strums his little ukulele and his voice lifts in mellow song. This DVD is magic!
Title: N/A

reviewText: Traditional yet contemporary. Carrying on with his lovely voice (now silenced except thru recordings)the tradition of aloha from the lovely islands of Hawaii. You will not be disappointed with any of his recordings.
Title: N/A

reviewText: This DVD provides some background about IZ, the big heart behind the deeply moving musical talent. His love affected all those who heard him perform. Now some years after his death, his message is being communicated via DVD to those of us who were unaware of him during his lifetime. What a joy to be able to experince IZ!!!
